entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers beginning near noon. Rain showers or flurries early this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 1.

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
